title: create_merchant_profile
description: Test the creation of a new merchant profile with valid and invalid data, ensuring required fields are validated and a merchant is created successfully with a 201 response.

title: get_merchant_by_id
description: Test retrieval of merchant details by merchant ID, verifying correct data is returned with a 200 response and handling of non-existent IDs.

title: create_order
description: Test order creation with valid merchant ID, items, and customer phone, ensuring order is created successfully and returns a 201 response.

title: create_booking
description: Test booking creation with required fields including merchant ID, customer phone, service, and start time, verifying successful booking creation with a 201 response.

title: handle_stripe_webhook_events
description: Test processing of Stripe webhook events with valid signature verification and idempotency, ensuring webhook events are handled correctly and return a 200 response.

title: handle_paypal_webhook_events
description: Test processing of PayPal webhook events with signature verification and idempotent handling, ensuring webhook events are processed successfully with a 200 response.

title: handle_incoming_twilio_voice_calls
description: Test handling of incoming Twilio voice calls, verifying correct TwiML response is returned for call routing and IVR interaction.

title: allocate_phone_number_to_merchant
description: Test allocation of a Twilio phone number to a merchant with valid merchant ID and optional region, ensuring number allocation succeeds with a 201 response.

title: connect_payment_provider
description: Test connecting a payment provider (Stripe or PayPal) to a merchant account, verifying required fields and successful connection with a 200 response.

title: send_sms_notification
description: Test sending SMS notifications via Twilio with valid recipient and message, ensuring SMS is sent successfully and returns a 200 response.
